# Bladed Dash, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[5th Level Magus Spells|Magus 5]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Inner Sea Magic, pg. 52

This spell functions like *[[Bladed Dash (Spell)|bladed dash]]*, save that you can make a single melee attack against every creature you pass during the 30 feet of your dash. You cannot attack an individual creature more than once with spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 6, Wizard 6 to Level.
